definitions.definition: A game which is of no consequence in terms of ranking, betting etc.
definitions.example: This match is merely a friendly, so don't worry too much about it.

definitions.definition: A person or entity on the same side in a conflict.
Generally warm, approachable and easy to relate with in character.
Having an easy or accepting relationship with something.
Promoting the good of any person; favourable; propitious.
Of or pertaining to friendlies (friendly noun sense 2, below). Also applied to other bipolar confrontations, such as team sports
definitions.example: The soldier was killed by friendly fire.

definitions.definition: Being or relating to two or more natural numbers with a common abundancy.
(in compounds) Compatible with, or not damaging to (the compounded noun).
definitions.example: Organic farms only use soil-friendly fertilisers.

definitions.definition: In a friendly manner, like a friend.
